original_text: No, you cannot even do a small thing like that. So, if you are always worrying about the things that you need, will that really help you?
korean_text: 그런즉 가장 작은 일도 하지 못하면서 어찌 다른 일들을 염려하느냐

sentences.original_text: No, you cannot even do a small thing like that
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 당신은 그런 작은 것조차 할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: So, if you are always worrying about the things that you need
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇다면, 당신이 필요한 것들에 대해 항상 걱정한다면
